casebody.data:
Richard A. RODRIGUE
v.
The TRAVELERS INSURANCE COMPANY, et al. NO. 2019-CC-0602 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 3, 2019 ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE CIVIL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF ORLEANS Writ denied. HUGHES, J., would deny.

GENOVESE, J., would deny and assigns reasons.

GENOVESE, J., would simply deny this writ outright without the mythical and untenable verbiage, "adequate remedy on appeal."
